channel.title: Mariadb on blog and posts from inxeoz
channel.description: Recent content in Mariadb on blog and posts from inxeoz

item.title: Start Mariadb
item.description:
docker run -d
–name mariadb
–network frappe-net
-e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=frappe
-e MYSQL_USER=frappe
-e MYSQL_PASSWORD=frappe
-e MYSQL_DATABASE=frappe
-v mariadb_data:/var/lib/mysql
-p 3307:3306
mariadb:10.6
